pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tgaring ta tqbaq biru la, miyuk cka sesiy, kmayan hancyo, “tuliq! tmatuk tunux!”
It’s time for class , the teacher walked into the classroom, and the monitor said: “Stand up! Salute!”
我今天七點到學校。: 上課了，老師走進教室，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mlawa cami maha: “sesiy lokah.”
We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們大聲的說:「老師好。」

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tqbaq cami mqwas biru ga, sbaqan cami nya ke lmpux na Tayal.
In class, the teacher taught us the Tayal language of numbers.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，老師教我們數字的族語。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: glux cami sesiy lmpux ru, mqwas cami qwas na lmpux.
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們跟著老師唸，我們唱了數字歌。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: piyux wayal mu tbaqan ke na tayal la.
I have learned many Tayal languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我學會好多族語。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: musa cu pqwasan biru krryax, tqbaq cu ke tayal krryax, skayan ru ppunung ni yaya mu.
I go to school every day, I learn the Tayal language every day, and I want to tell my mother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我天天上學，我天天學族語，我要講給媽媽聽。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: lalu mu ga Maray.
My name is Maray.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的名字是Maray。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: lalu yaba mu ga Yosi.
My dad’s name is Yosi.
我今天七點到學校。: 我爸爸的名字是Yosi。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: lalu yaya mu ga Miyo.
My mother’s name is Miyo.
我今天七點到學校。: 我媽媽的名字是Miyo。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mpux kawas mu la.
I am 10 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我今年10歲。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: maki qutux qbsuyal mu mlikuy, Hayun lalu nya, mpux qutux kawas nya la.
I have a brother, his name is Hayun, he is 11 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個哥哥，他叫Hayun，他今年11歲。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: msqun cami mqwas qutux pqwasan biru.
We study in the same school.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在同一間學校讀書。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: smoya cami calay mqwas qwas.
Both my brother and I like to sing.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和哥哥都喜歡唱歌。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: smoya cu lmngyaq, ryax hngawan lga, msqun cami musa lmngyaq qabax muyax myan.
I like swimming. During the holidays, our whole family go swimming together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡游泳，放假的時候，我們全家會一起去游泳。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: piyux qnbaq mu qayus na rangi, msqun cami mqwas qwas ru lmngyaq.
I love meeting new people, we can sing and swim together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡認識新朋友，我們可以一起唱歌和游泳。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kingan ga laqi na Tayal.
I am an Tayal child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我是泰雅族的小孩。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: cyan maki Skikun muyax myan.
Our family lives in Skikun.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家住在四季。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: magan qabax he muyax myan.
There are five people in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家共有五個人。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tyugan mcwhi qabax muyax myan.
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家有三個兄弟姊妹。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: msqun cu yaba yaya qbsuyal mlikuy ru qbsuyal kneril maki muyax.
I live with my father, mother, brother and sister.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥和姊姊住在一起。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: hlawax calay yaba mu, cyan alan knsat hiya.
My father is tall and he is a policeman.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很高，我的爸爸是警察。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: hekang calay yaya mu, cyan alan ising hiya.
My mother is thin and my mom is a doctor.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的媽媽很瘦，我的媽媽是醫生。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: baq cami kmayan ke Tayal ki yaba mu maki cqa muyax.
My father speaks the ethnic language with us at home.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸在家會和我們說族語。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: hngawan cqa ryax ’bagan ga musa cami qalang.
We will all go back to the tribe during the summer vacation.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們暑假都會回部落。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: msqun cami kimyap qtangu ki qbsuyal mlikuy ru kneril.
My brothers and sisters and I will catch frogs together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和兄姊會一起抓青蛙。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: siyan mu calay he muyax myan qani.
I like our family very much.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很喜歡我們家的人。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: msqun cu musa mcisan tanux ki yaya mu.
I went out with my mother today.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天我和媽媽出去玩。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mtasiq ru blaq kayal nya saniq coni, ini kltu ini kilux kayal nya, sqblaq calay qsliq behuy qani.
The sky is blue during the day, the weather is neither cold nor hot, and the wind is cool.
我今天七點到學校。: 白天的天空很藍，天氣不冷也不熱，風很涼爽。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mtama cami roq ru maniq cami menpaw, lhol calay he sbu’ cami nya wagi qani.
We ate bread on the grass, the sun was shining on us, and it was very warm.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在草地上吃著麵包，陽光灑在身上，非常溫暖。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: babaw knryax lga, mtalah qa kayal la.
In the afternoon, the sky turned red.
我今天七點到學校。: 下午，天空變紅了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tbaqan mu yaya mu, cwa baq mtalah qa kayal qani.
I asked my mother why the sky is red.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問媽媽，為甚麼天空是紅色的。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kmayan yaya maha, pbehuy hayi lay.
Mom said, maybe the typhoon is coming.
我今天七點到學校。: 媽媽說，可能是颱風要來了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: uka yulung nya gbiyan qani ru, mhtux qa knituh nya la.
There were no clouds in the sky at night, and the stars came out.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上天上沒有雲，星星出來了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: musa cami muyax uyi la.
We were going home too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們也要回家了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: maki cami cka ryaniq ga, psina cu knalu ru pzimu cu knituh qani.
On the way home, I made a wish with the stars,
我今天七點到學校。: 在回家的路上，我跟星星許願。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: akya ini uwah qa behuy qani, smoya cu calay musa mcisan tanux loyi.
I hope the typhoon doesn't come, I still want to go out to play again.
我今天七點到學校。: 希望颱風不要來，我還想再出去玩。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: cyan maki biyh muyax myan qa pqawasn biru, khangi cu musa pqawasn biru ru, khangi cu mwah muyax uyi.
My school is next to our house, I walk to school every day, and I also walk home.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的學校在我們家旁邊，我天天走路去學校，也走路回家。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: ini ktyaba ciyan pqawasn myan biru qani, ini kpiyux seto ru, mqbaq cami qabax.
Our school is not big, there are not many students, everyone knows each other.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們學校不大，沒有很多學生，大家互相認識。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: msli cami cqa kki’an na csalan ru, msqun cami cisan boru, mkkayan cami uyi.
All the children will gather in the playground, play ball and chat together.
我今天七點到學校。: 所有小朋友會聚在操場，一起玩球、一起聊天。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: baq msqun mcisan cami qa sesiy, giwan qutux muyax qa pqwasan biru qani.
The teachers also play with us, the school is one big family.
我今天七點到學校。: 老師們也會和我們一起玩，學校是個大家庭。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: cmapuh cami krryax ru, blequn myan mcmapuh qa kki’an myan pqwasan qani.
We have to clean every day, and everyone has to clean the classroom.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們每天都要打掃，大家要把教室打掃乾淨。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mcmon tubun kruma cquliq ru, mcmapuh kruma cquliq.
Some people clean the windows, some sweep the floor.
我今天七點到學校。: 有些人去擦窗戶，有些人去掃地。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: cpuhan myan qabax lingay na pqwasan biru, mbuyux ru mkrax cami, mlabu calay pqwasan biru krryax.
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們還會打掃學校的各個角落，大家分工合作，學校每天都很乾淨。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: chesa ga, mnwah cu mkan yutas cqa qalang.
Yesterday, I went to visit my grandpa in the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天，我去部落拜訪爺爺。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: bsyaq cami calay ini pktayux la, llungun mu calay hiya.
We haven’t seen each other for a long time and I miss him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們很久沒有見面了，我很想念他。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: ktalan cu nya yutas mu lga, pniqan cu nya sikwa ru, pbxan cu nya ocya.
As soon as grandpa saw me, he invited me to eat watermelon and drink tea.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺一看到我，就請我吃西瓜，請我喝茶。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: lbing calay sikwa mnuya ni yutas mu, blaq calay nniqun.
The watermelon grown by grandpa is very sweet and really delicious.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺種的西瓜很甜，真的很好吃。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: siyan mu calay ocya na yutas mu, balaq calay buxn.
I also like grandpa’s tea, it’s tasted good too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我也喜歡爺爺的茶，也很好喝。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: qlyan lga, msqun cu phayuy knryax ki yaki mu.
At noon, I cooked lunch with my grandma.
我今天七點到學校。: 中午的時候，我和奶奶一起煮午餐。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: piyux calay pnhapuy knryax ni yaki mu, maki qulih, ngta, qabang ru knghi.
Grandma cooked a big lunch, including fish, chicken, pumpkin, and snails.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有蝸牛。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mnaniq cami knryax lga, musa cami hmikut ramat cqa qmayah la.
After lunch, we went to the vegetable garden to pick vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 吃完午餐後，我們去菜園摘菜。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: piyux calay ngahi cehuy ru qenux mniq cu ni yaki mu, aray muyax son cu nya.
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: msgagay cami ki yutas ru yaki, kyalun mu mwah cu babaw nya loyi.
I said goodbye to them and said I’d see them next time.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟他們道別，說下次再去看他們。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: naray cami nya kki’an qbsinux qa sesiy ru, pbkux cami mna lasu blihun tbes kipu qani.
Today the teacher took us to the zoo, and we lined up at the gate to buy tickets.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天老師帶我們去動物園，我們在門口排隊買票。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: miyuk cami cqa kki’an qbsinux qani lga, kyalun cami nya sesiy maha:“llasu ga kki’an ni qbhniq, mehong hiya ga kki’an ni maqu, ktayux kya cimu nanaq la.”
After entering the zoo, the teacher said, There are birds in the front and snakes in the back
我今天七點到學校。: so you can visit them yourself.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34429/5: 進入動物園後，老師說:「前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。」

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mngungu cu maqu hiya, mica ini cu soya ktayux kki’an na maqu.
I'm afraid of snakes, so I don't look at snakes.
我今天七點到學校。: 我會怕蛇，所以我不看蛇類。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: piyux wal mu ktalan qa qbhniq qani, mlaka cqa babaw na qhoniq, wal mu ktalan cyan m’abi cqa bling qhoniq qa lqum uyi.
I saw a lot of birds flying around in the trees and saw owls sleeping in tree hollows.
我今天七點到學校。: 我看到了很多鳥，他們在樹上飛來飛去，還有看到貓頭鷹在樹洞裡睡覺。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: maki zow ru rme ru ngarux cqa kki’an qbsinux qani, iyat mu kintalan na qabax qbsinux qani, wal mu ktalan lga, mqas cu calay.
There are elephants, horses and tigers in the zoo. I have never seen these animals before. I was really happy to see them today.
我今天七點到學校。: 動物園裡有大象、馬和老虎，我從前沒有看過這些動物，今天看到了真的很開心。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: piyux wayal mu psingan qa siyasin qani, pktalun mu yaba ru yaya mu.
I took a lot of pictures and showed them to my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 我拍了很多照片，給爸爸媽媽看。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: babaw nya lga, rayun mu ktayux yaba ru yaya mu.
Next time I will come with my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 下次要跟爸爸媽媽一起來。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: hngawan ryax qani ga, msqun cu qbsuyal mu kneril musa mkan mama myan cqa Tayto.
This holiday, my sister and I went to Taitung to visit my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個假日，我和姊姊去台東拜訪叔叔。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mglux cami kisya ru, kahol cami Bnka musa Tayto.
We took the train from Taipei to Taitung.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們從台北搭火車去臺東。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tehoq cami Tayto lga, qmet toruy qa mama ru, halan cami nya lmwah cqa eki.
When we arrived in Taitung, my uncle drove to the station to pick us up.
我今天七點到學校。: 到了台東，叔叔開車來車站接我們。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: ini thiyaq ciyan eki ru muyax ni mama mu, ini cami kinga tehok muyax nya.
The station is not far from my uncle’s house, and it’s just a short drive away.
我今天七點到學校。: 車站離叔叔家沒有很遠，開車一下子就到了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: bih muyax ni mama mu ga, maki hlabang na kki’an knyatan ru, msqun cami qmet zitensya musa kya.
There is a big ranch near my uncle’s house, and we rode bicycles to the ranch together.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔家附近有個很大的牧場，我們一起騎腳踏車到牧場。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: maki cami kya ga, rayun cami nya sm’an mit ru rme qa mama.
In the ranch, my uncle took us to feed the sheep and ride horses.
我今天七點到學校。: 在牧場，叔叔帶我們餵羊和騎馬。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: gbyan lga, msqun cami musa maniq cqa maci.
In the evening, we went to the city to have dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上，我們一起去市區吃飯。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: piyux qa toruy na maci qani, mica qa qmet cami otobay musa kya.
There are a lot of cars in the city, so we go there by motorcycle.
我今天七點到學校。: 市區車子很多，所以我們騎摩托車去那裡。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: uwah myan muyax lga, wal qriqun cquliq qa ototbay nya la, si cami glux basu mwah muyax la.
When we were about to leave, we found that the motorcycle had been stolen, so we had to leave by bus.
我今天七點到學校。: 要離開的時候，發現摩托車被偷了，我們只好搭公車離開。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tehok cami cqa Bnka lga, ini myan kbaki maha, kuna wal lun otobay ni mama mu la!
Now that we are back in Taipei, I don’t know if my uncle’s motorcycle has been found.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我們回到台北了，不知道叔叔的摩托車找到了沒有！

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: laqi cu na ga, mnaki cami qalang Skikun, qaring cu mqwas biru lga, musa cami maki Girang la, ski mwani mqyanux cami cqa heci.
When we were young, our family lived in Skikun. After I started school, we moved to Yilan and have been living in the city ever since.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我們家住在四季，上學以後，就搬到了宜蘭，一直在都市裡生活。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mqwas cu raygako lga, musa cu tqbaq gaga qnxan na Tayal la, mica kbqun mu qabax mnanaq gaga na qnxan Genzuming.
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.
我今天七點到學校。: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mica qa, ryax hngawan bagan ga, kingan ru qbsuyal mu mlikuy musa cami mkan bnheci cqa qalang, smoya cu calay tqbaq gaga na glux mu nanaq.
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.
我今天七點到學校。: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: ktalan mu bnheci qani ga spatun mpux kawas nya la, ana ga pisan hayi sening ktalan na.
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.
我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tkbaqan mu, baq kmayan ke nanu qa hiya, bbaq ru hyuci calay knayan nya ke Tayal, baq kmayan ke kahat ru Truko ru ke Gipun uyi.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Atayal, as well as Hokkien, Truku and Japanese.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的泰雅語說得很流利，也會說閩南語、太魯閣語和日本話。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tqbaqan mu loyi ga. mica kbaqun mu maha, baq tgaring llaqi na ga, tqbaq ke Gipun, kneril nya kahul Truko ru, mqbaq piyux kahat cqa ptyawan nya.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Truku, and he knows many Hokkien at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是太魯閣族人，而他工作上認識許多閩南人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mkkayan cami ki bnheci qani ga, piyux wal nya pinqiyan kinbaqan na qmalup qani.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: ana myan ini kbaqi ciyan mung pinqiyan nya ga, wal myan halan ppsyasing ke pinqiyan nya, ana myan blequn mung qa ke nya loyi.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: llaqi cu na ga, ini mu kbaqi ciyan gaga na glux mu nanaq, mica mcayux cu hayi son ma cquliq cu Tayal.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tqbaqan mu gaga qani lga, mqas cu calay son ma Tayal, mnanaq ru strahu mu ru ssyun mu calay inlungan.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Tayal is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為泰雅族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: gbyan kisa ga, mwah muyax qa swahi mu mlikuy la.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: musa cami mes ngta cqa ptbesan qqaya, alan myan phapuy k’abi qa swahi mu mlikuy.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: hmenas cami tbesan ramat lga, piyux blaq ru mica na hnbiyat qa ramat maki tbesan ramat qani.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，菜攤有好多新鮮的青菜。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mnes cami ramat horenso, qusaw ru raykon.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kmayan binah cyan tbes bway qa cquliq maha, “lbing calay onray ru qenam mu, bes cikay ga!”
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mnes cami onray ru qenam ki yaki mu.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: hmnas cami tbesan syam lga, kmayan qa tbes syam qa cquliq maha, “pbes su nanu? msyam calay ngta myan coni, qutux pila nya ga tyugan qbhul.”
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today’s chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mnglun yaki maha hmet ciyan la, hali khway cikay pila nya son nya qa tbesan syam qaca.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kmayan cquliq tbes syam qaca cimang pila nya la, ini kbqi pbiyaq pila nya la.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kmayan binah qa cquliq maha, “uwah mes qulih mu, cimam pila besun ru tyaba qa qulih mu qani.”
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: pucing nya lga mnes cami ngta ru qulih, musa cami muyax ru hpuyan myan qa ramat qani la.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: bsyaq cami mna ru, mnkung qa kayal nya la.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mnwah renwa qa swahi mu mlikuy maha, ini cami qbaq mhngaw coni la, aky ski cqa babaw hngawan ryax ga, baq cu mwah muyax la.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn’t take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kmayan yaki talagay nhapuy qani la, tapih qabax lpyung uwah squn mniq kusa.
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let’s eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mwah qabax qa lpyung ru, msqun cami mniq k’abi nhapuy ni yaki.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: maki qutux seto mu Pasan lalu nya, mngi maray qqaya krryax qa hiya.
I have a classmate named Pasan, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Pasan，他常常忘記帶東西。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mqwas cami biru ga, musa ksiyux seto cqa enpit ccom ru brban qa hiya.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: minqutux, mnxan ru mtyugan ga, ksyuxan myan qqaya hiya ha.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: ana ga qutih calay kako nya la, ksiyuxan myan qqaya lga ini cami biqi loyi.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: pucing nya lga, ini myan siyay ksiyux qqaya hiya la.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: minqutux ryax, musa cami mcisan habax myan.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: cka ryaniq na ga, akya musa stanux qa Pasan qani. ana ga wal mngi maray ciligami qa Pasan la.
On the way, Pasan wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Pasan想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: akya musa ksiyux ciligami seto qa hiya, kmayan qabax naha, ini cami aray uyi.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mnkux ru mngilis qa Pasan qani la, myuhung kmayan maha, cwa mamu ini ksyuxi ciligami kingan!
Pasan burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Pasan急的哭了出來，他生氣的說，為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kyalun ni seto maha, cwa su ini aray nanaq, ana ga wal su myan ksyuxan qqaya ga, ini su calay biqi cami loyi!
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kncyuxan nya mwah cami mqwas biru lga, mhyuboq tehoq pqwasan biru qa Pasan ru, sbiq cami nya qabax wal myan ksyuxan hiya qa qqaya la.
The next day at school, Pasan arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Pasan很早就到學校了，Pasan把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: nway son nya qabax seto ru, kyalun cami nya maha p’aray cu nanaq qqaya babaw nya la, mhway cimu ru smwan cimu pksiyux qqaya kingan.
Pasan apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Pasan向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: yaba mu ga cquliq na qmalup maki cqa qalang.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: llaqi cu na ga, mhngan musa ttanux qa yaba ru mama mu, maray lalaw ru patus naha.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tmma’ lga, maray qbsinux naha mwah la.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kruma ga biyok ru yapit, kruma uyi ga maki biyut uyi.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: qsyuxan naha qa qbsinux maki cqa qalang ru, sbiq naha cquliq uyi.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tkibux cu yaba mu krryax, smoya cu mglux musa qmalup qa yaba.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kmayan yaba maha, long cikay tyaba kawas su lga, rayaw misu la.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: baq smi mrusa kruma cquliq uyi, sqbalay naha skakay, sqolu ru rangay.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: bbaq calay smi skakay ru sqolu qa yaba mu, kmayan yaba maha, qani hiya ga pkiyap biyut hiya, akya blequn ktayux tuqi na qbsinux qani, ssyan ta cqa qnapan wahan na qbsinux qani.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: eta ta helax hayi mglux yaba musa qmalup maha cu, nyan cu si tqbaq smi rusa krryax, maha cqani lga ini kinga baq ciliq rusa mu la.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: ktalan cu ni yaba mu lga, baq kmayan maha, babaw nya ga akya su bbaq calay qmalup na cquliq.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: nyan cu mrkyas ru tyaba kawas la, panan mu bhenux bneloq ru tlqi, mglux cu yaba mu musa qmalup.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mwah cami muyax lga, sqasux myan cquliq qabax cniliq myan qani.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kmayan yaba, lanay ta shuway knalu na utux bnheci ta, sbiq ta nya piyux na qbsinux qani.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: cuqi cu musa pinqwasan biru saniq coni.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mnwah cu pinqwasan ga, mingi cu maray kabang bbiru.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: ana nanu qnqaya ini cu aray.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: t’arang mqwas ga, kingan ki glux mu ga squn cami mktayax biru.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: pcpngan pinqwasan ga, k’syuxun cu nya ppbiru ro ccom qa glux mu.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kyalun cu nya sesiy maha, “m_yubuq hayi mtuliq saniq babaw nya, ta mcuqi la!”
The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: Silan cnlalu nya qa blaq na lpyung mu, hiya ga laqi na Tayal uyi.
My good friend’s name is Silan, and he is also an Tayal child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Silan，他也是泰雅族的小孩。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: nyan cami glux mqwas biru qa qalang Skikun.
We study together in the Skikun tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在四季部落讀書。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: squn myan mung ke bnheci na tyaba kawas krryax, baq cami kmayal ke Tayal qabax.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Tayal proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說泰雅語。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: hlawax cu calay ro mqthoy cu calay uyi, Silan hiya ga mrroq calay ro mhekang calay uyi.
I am tall and overweight, while Silan is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Silan很矮也很瘦。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: Silan hiya ga msuna blaq mqyanux calay, siyan nya hiya qabax ta.
Silan is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Silan很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: unrokay na pqwasan ryax coni, pqwasan ga rmurux knpiyux na pcpngan.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: maki pcpngan na hmuluy qthoy gasil, klkah boru, mktlyung, ppiyuy, ro mu’ slqi.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: mcpung cu mktlyung.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: trang mktlyung cu ga, mtakuy cu la, piyux sramu ciyan ramu na tari mu la.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: ana ga mtuliq cu, si cu skura glasux mktlyung.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: eta cu qes pcingan laga, qabax cquliq ga mqas lungan naha qabax.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: ana cu ini agal cnlalu te qutux qnabu, ana ga mqas cu calay, baha hmcwa wan mu msqun pcpngan qani la.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: chesa kingan ru yaba mu ga mnwah cami mkan mama mu.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: cyan mqelis kakay mama mu la.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kyalun cami nya, nya mbling qa rnamux muyax la.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kblayun nya rnamux muyax ga, knahul rnamux wan mtoruy la.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: maray he kacing ru bingro yaba biqan nya mama.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kingan ro mama ga mcisal cami kya iyik ’bayn, piyux ke bnheci qsyuxun cu nya kmayal.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: iyik shriq cu ga, trahu cu nyan mama maha wan su mhlawax la. wan su qenah betunux ciyal.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kyalun mu maha nna mblaq kakay mama laga, babaw nya uwah mcisal muyax myan uyi.
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34429/5: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: maki saying seng ro pusan saying kawas, wan mcqrux lhuyan qa Sexu, mkkayal maha, lalu na Tayal ga ana nanak sbiru ta babaw kya Nibunsyo.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: nwahan mu tqbaq mrkyas na qalang qa Pasang Yawi, knbsyaq kihuy skura Sexu qa magal yaw sqa lalu na Tayal ga huyay nanak sbiru babaw kya Nibunsyo la.
I interviewed Pasang Yawi, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Pasang Yawi。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kingan ro hiya ga lman cami mkkayal, ryax hngawan qani ga musa cu muyax nya mkan hiya.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: cka na nwahan mu tqbaq ga, cbaqan cu nya puying yaw qa lalu nya, rayun cu nya pnbaq qabax cinmuyax nya ro qalang nya uyi.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: pqutan mu hiya, hmcwa squxan su lungan qa m’iyux lalu qani, ini kblaq snyan su miru lalu cyunga?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kyalun cu nya hiya maha, baha hmcwa, sbiru patas na ke Cyukok qani ga ini huyay pinktayux qa hngya’an na lalu nya, binah cquliq ga sgyun nya maha “pa syeng seng”, mica nya tmwang piyux calay na pinssyaqan uyi.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Ba Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34429/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「巴先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kmayal Pasang Yawi maha, “tmamas pintasan biru lalu na Genzyumin ga musa calay pktayux sqa lalu ta, lalu mu hiya ga kingiwan cnlalu na mirok ta, glux ta, sinrxan ta, sinnnay ta qenah musa piyux glux ta Tayal ga baq m’ulu lalu naha nanak.”
Pasang Yawi said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34429/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Pasang Yawi說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kingan ro yaki mnwah cami smi qnqaya ptbesan kya, piyux rramat pinnuyax yaki ga naray nya kya, biqan nya qabax ta nniqun na Genzyumin qa knalay nya.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: qabax naha ga siyan nya ptbesan na yaki, kuriq ro kbaqit ga piyux cquliq mes, piyux calay cquliq tmalam rramat tnahuk nya.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和山蘇很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: tnahuk nya mala ro sumul ga blaq niqun calay, maki loyi tnahuk nya biyok tnwang maqaw, nyan hmuluy lungan cquliq lmosay qa kinsokan nya, nyan si cqrux kya ptbesan myan ro nna mes.
The ferns and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的蕨菜和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的馬告滷肉，味道吸引了很多客

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: trang stahuk nniqun yaki ga, sgyun mu cquliq lmosay, phngiyang cu hmwaw, rramat qani ga pnuya myan nanak, rakis calay, helax uwah mes wah!
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34429/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: helax suqun ptbes qa qnqaya myan, kman yaki maha, baha hmcwa ga, “ulung maki isu rmax.”
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: yaw qani, wan mu tnbaqan yaw na k’man, kkhoniq Tayal ro tnbaqan na nniqun, pnbaq cu uwiy calay musa ptbes qnqaya ptbesan qani.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

pitu tmucing saniq tehoq cu pqwasan biru: kntalan mu siyan nya lungan calay qabax nniqun Tayal qani qa yaki, pqasun mu ro mqoyat cu calay uyi.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
